resources.string: Your email. This will be used for login.
User uploaded profile picture, or blank otherwise

This is your user profile page. Here, you can view information about yourself such as your rating, comments others have made about you, and your current listings. If you would like to learn more about any of the information listed here, please look below.
Here, you can view all of your current listings for items you have posted. You can edit or delete them at any point by selecting them.
Your user profile will show basic information you provide about yourself, such as your profile picture and your biography. You can always change these at any time using the edit feature.
Use this function to delete your profile. Please note that this cannot be undone, so please only use this if you are CERTAIN that you would like to do so.
